### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    behavior_score INT,
    preferences JSON
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    behavior_score INT,
    preferences JSON
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customers SET email = CONCAT(name, '@example.com') WHERE customer_id = 456
